home.name: Dmitry Kolotusha
home.info: Web developer with 1 year experience. Experience lies in the creation of dynamic sites (SPA). I build websites based on React and Vue. I make them functional and optimized.

text.h3: My name is Dmitry Kolotusha and I am a
text.p: Hardworking and motivated web developer. I like to design and revitalize websites. I like to solve problems, learn new technologies and know how to ask questions to learn faster. At the moment, I already have experience with Vue.js and React.js. I'm not going to stop there and will continue to look for experience in different projects...

vue.title: Vue 3 Course
vue.text: Getting to know and learning the Vue 3 framework at Result.School

js.title: JavaScript marathon
js.text: Intensive marathon in JavaScript. The author of the course is Vladilen Minin, founder of Result.Shool

react.title: React marathon
react.text: Intensive React marathon for 4 weeks. The author of the course is Zar Zakharov, an active developer with 15 years of experience.

frontend.title: Frontend developer course
frontend.text: First acquaintance with HTML, CSS, React, Git. The courses were conducted by ORmedia

itStep.title: Computer Academy STEP
itStep.text: Trained as a software developer. The first serious acquaintance with IT. Acquainted with C, C++, C#, SQL, Python

result_shool.title: Result.Shool
result_shool.text: Development of web pages on Vue 3, code optimization, development on the Composition API, rewriting code from the Option API to the Composition API

ormedia.title: ORMedia
